title: Supramolecular motifs formed by CH3/Cl-substituted arene groups: evidence for structural differences in thiophosphoramides and similarities in their complexes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32206-32220
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05281A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Saeed Hosseinpoor, Mehrdad Pourayoubi, Eliška Zmeškalová, Morgane Poupon
Different electrostatic potentials of the Cl/CH3 substituted aryl groups affect the molecular packings of thiophosphoramides/complexes in distinct ways.
